segments.text: Welcome , sir , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy some records .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there the records of Michael Jackson ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His records have been sold out . The new copies will be available next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . it's too late . Maybe I should go to other video stores to have a look .
segments.speaker: S2
